type.description:
### ⚠️ Requires [Extra Origins](https://github.com/MoriyaShiine/extra-origins/wiki) to be installed! ⚠️

Grants [Status Effect](https://origins.readthedocs.io/en/latest/types/entity_condition_types/status_effect/) immunity from food effects, such as Hunger from Rotten Flesh.
type.markdownDescription:
### ⚠️ Requires [Extra Origins](https://github.com/MoriyaShiine/extra-origins/wiki) to be installed! ⚠️

Grants [Status Effect](https://origins.readthedocs.io/en/latest/types/entity_condition_types/status_effect/) immunity from food effects, such as Hunger from Rotten Flesh.

effects.description: The effects that the entity will be immune to.
effects.markdownDescription: The effects that the entity will be immune to.

inverted.description: If true, the power will make the entity immune to everything except the specified effects.
inverted.markdownDescription: If true, the power will make the entity immune to everything except the specified effects.
